mil3.7.1:1.5: “Abhijanatopi, maharaja, sati uppajjati, katumikayapi sati uppajjati, olarikavinnanatopi sati uppajjati, hitavinnanatopi sati uppajjati, ahitavinnanatopi sati uppajjati, sabhaganimittatopi sati uppajjati, visabhaganimittatopi sati uppajjati, kathabhinnanatopi sati uppajjati, lakkhanatopi sati uppajjati, saranatopi sati uppajjati, muddatopi sati uppajjati, gananatopi sati uppajjati, dharanatopi sati uppajjati, bhavanatopi sati uppajjati, potthakanibandhanatopi sati uppajjati, upanikkhepatopi sati uppajjati, anubhutatopi sati uppajjatiti.
mil3.7.1:2.2: Yatha, maharaja, ayasma ca anando khujjuttara ca upasika, ye va pana annepi keci jatissara jatim saranti, evam abhijanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:3.2: Yo pakatiya mutthassatiko, pare ca tam sarapanattham nibandhanti, evam katumikaya sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:4.2: Yada rajje va abhisitto hoti, sotapattiphalam va patto hoti, evam olarikavinnanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:5.2: Yamhi sukhapito, ‘amukasmim evam sukhapito’ti sarati, evam hitavinnanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:6.2: Yamhi dukkhapito, ‘amukasmim evam dukkhapito’ti sarati, evam ahitavinnanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:7.2: Sadisam puggalam disva mataram va pitaram va bhataram va bhaginim va sarati, ottham va gonam va gadrabham va disva annam tadisam ottham va gonam va gadrabham va sarati, evam sabhaganimittato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:8.2: Asukassa nama vanno ediso, saddo ediso, gandho ediso, raso ediso, photthabbo edisoti sarati, evampi visabhaganimittatopi sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:9.2: Yo pakatiya mutthassatiko hoti, tam pare sarapenti, tena so sarati, evam kathabhinnanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:10.2: Yo pakatiya balibaddanam angena janati, lakkhanena janati, evam lakkhanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:11.2: Yo pakatiya mutthassatiko hoti, yo tam ‘sarahi bho, sarahi bho’ti punappunam sarapeti, evam saranato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:12.2: Lipiya sikkhitatta janati ‘imassa akkharassa anantaram imam akkharam katabban’ti evam muddato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:13.2: Gananaya sikkhitatta ganaka bahumpi ganenti, evam gananato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:14.2: Dharanaya sikkhitatta dharanaka bahumpi dharenti, evam dharanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:15.2: Idha bhikkhu anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati, seyyathidam—
mil3.7.1:15.4: iti sakaram sauddesam pubbenivasam anussarati, evam bhavanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:16.2: Rajano anusasaniyam assaranta etam potthakam aharathati, tena potthakena anussaranti, evam potthakanibandhanato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:17.2: Upanikkhittam bhandam disva sarati, evam upanikkhepato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:18.2: Ditthatta rupam sarati, sutatta saddam sarati, ghayitatta gandham sarati, sayitatta rasam sarati, phutthatta photthabbam sarati, vinnatatta dhammam sarati, evam anubhutato sati uppajjati.
mil3.7.1:18.3: Imehi kho, maharaja, sattarasahakarehi sati uppajjati”ti.
